purpleculture_pinyin:
lāo
to fish up; to dredge up
ловить рыбу; выкапывать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 捞)
Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
撈取 [ lāo qǔ ]: to fish for; to seek profit (by improper means)
撈錢 [ lāo qián ]: lit. to dredge for money; to make money by reprehensible means; to fish for a quick buck
撈一把 [ lāo yī bǎ ]: to profiteer; to gain some underhand advantage
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 勞 [ láo ] to labor, to toil; to do manual work
heisig_chinese_memo: Laborers like gardeners often scoop up things with their fingers.
Ru_trainchinese: lāo: (глаг) вылавливать; получать нечестным путем; возвращать (утраченное); (диал.) хватать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: My first job was in an ice cream shop where my labor was to scoop up ice cream with my fingers and glop it onto a cone.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " hand ", " labor " sound, represent extract from water or other liquids. Tang Yuanzhen's "One Hundred Rhymes of Rewarding Le Tian's Southeast Line Poem": "Clams are fished in the mud puddle, and the wilderness is dangerous."

" Fishing " can mean obtaining. "Journey to the West" Chapter 41: "I will fight with him again, and I will try to get him a stick, but it is not good?"

" Fishing " also means obtaining property by improper means. "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 79: "This military uniform business is the best way to make money. I don't know how much he made."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand ", " labor " sound, represent extract from water or other liquids.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「勞」聲，表示從水或其他液體中取物。唐元稹〈酬樂天東南行詩一百韻〉：「泥浦喧撈蛤，荒郊險鬥貙。」

　　「撈」可表示獲取。《西游記》第41回：「我再與他鬥幾合，我取巧兒撈他一棒，卻不是好？」

　　「撈」也表示用不正當的手段取得財物。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第79回：「這軍裝買賣是最好賺錢的，不知他撈了多少。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「勞」聲，表示從水或其他液體中取物。

lao1
HSK 6: 撈,捞
(Simplified: 捞)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 勞 [ láo ] to labor, to toil; to do manual work
①從液體裏面取東西：撈取。打撈。大海撈針。
②用不正當的手段取得：撈一把。[合]打撈(把沉在水裏的東西找着取上來)；捕撈(捕捉和打撈)；撈採(向水中採物。)
撈取 [ lāo qǔ ]: to fish for; to seek profit (by improper means)
撈錢 [ lāo qián ]: lit. to dredge for money; to make money by reprehensible means; to fish for a quick buck
撈一把 [ lāo yī bǎ ]: to profiteer; to gain some underhand advantage
(Simplified: 捞)

Pictophonetic: 勞 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.

Chinese: Laborers like gardeners often scoop up things with their fingers.
Meaning: scoop up
Hanzi: 捞
Story: My first job was in an ice cream shop where my labor was to scoop up ice cream with my fingers and glop it onto a cone.
Kind: traditional
從「 手 」，「 勞 」聲，表示從水或其他液體中取物。唐元稹〈酬樂天東南行詩一百韻〉：「泥浦喧撈蛤，荒郊險鬥貙。」 「 撈 」可表示獲取。《西游記》第41回：「我再與他鬥幾合，我取巧兒撈他一棒，卻不是好？」 「 撈 」也表示用不正當的手段取得財物。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第79回：「這軍裝買賣是最好賺錢的，不知他撈了多少。」
From the " hand", " labor" sound, represent extract from water or other liquids. Tang Yuanzhen's "One Hundred Rhymes of Rewarding Le Tian's Southeast Line Poem": "Clams are fished in the mud puddle, and the wilderness is dangerous." " Fishing" can mean obtaining. "Journey to the West" Chapter 41: "I will fight with him again, and I will try to get him a stick, but it is not good?" " Fishing" also means obtaining property by improper means. "The Strange Situation I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 79: "This military uniform business is the best way to make money. I don't know how much he made."

撈字的基本解释

撈
lāo
见“捞”。

撈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lāo］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
“捞1”的繁体字。
(1)从水或其他液体中取物。
(2)取；获取。
(3)用不正当的手段取得财物。
(4)捉拿。
(5)唠，唠叨。参见“撈嘴”。
[②]［láo］
“捞2”的繁体字。
见“撈2什子”。

撈字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撈； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页453第23
【唐韻】魯刀切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】郞刀切，?音勞。沈取曰撈，言沒入水中取物也。　又【集韻】郞到切，音澇。義同。又力弔切，音料。同撩。【揚子·方言】取也。【郭璞註】謂鉤撈也。　又憐蕭切，音聊。義同。通作摷。

撈字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
撈字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lāo］
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
The traditional characters of "Lao 1".
(1) Take things from water or other liquids.
(2) Take; get.
(3) Obtain property by improper means.
(4) Capture.
(5) Nagging, nagging. See "fishing mouth".
[②]［láo］
The traditional characters of "Lao 2".
See "Fishing 2 Shizi".

Shen fetched and said to fish, and said that he was submerged in the water to fetch things.　[Jiyun] So sharp, sound waterlogged. The same meaning. And force the cut, the sound material. Same flirt. 【Yangtze Dialect】Take also. [Guo Pu's Note] That hook fishing is also.　 Pity and Xiaoqi again, voice chat. The same meaning. The pass is made.
